brewery.brewery_description:
Minipivovar byl založen v říjnu roku 2013. Jedná se o jeden z nejmenších pivovarů v České republice s ročním výstavem cca 300 hl. Stabilně dodáváme pivo pouze do naší restaurace. Všechna piva vyrábíme klasickou českou technologií – varna, spilka, ležácký sklep.

Vaříme dekokčním způsobem na dva rmuty. Slad dovážíme z humnové sladovny v Dobrušce. Používáme český chmel (nejvíce premiant a žatecký poloranný červeňák), příležitostně i jiné české odrůdy.

Používáme kvasnice spodního kvašení. Hlavní kvašení probíhá v otevřených kvasných kádích při teplotách do 10°C.

Teplota v prostoru ležáckých tanků je 2 až 3° C. Naše pivo dozrává v případě jedenáctky 21 dní a déle, silnější piva o několik týdnů déle.

beer.beer_name: Tmavý Speciál  2021 s meduňkou a citronovou kůrou

user.bio: Lepší pivo v žaludku nežli voda na plicích!

items.badge_description: Happy Untappd anniversary to you! Thanks for sticking around and drinking socially with us. Cheers! That's 2 years on Untappd!
Your quest to quench your thirst leaves no stone unturned! That's at least 5 distinct venues!
It takes the perfect amount of light, the right framing and a touch of creative love to get the perfect picture of your brew. Now it’s time to drink it! That’s 5 check-ins with a photo.
Traveling the world is hard, but not for you. It's as easy as cracking open a new brew! You have had a beer from at least 5 different regions around the world. Try 5 more for Level 2!
Light and crisp, a Pilsner is all you need to make your day great. Though, perhaps another one would make it even better. That’s 5 different Pilsners. Try 5 more for Level 2!

Wine isn't the only beverage worthy of pairing with a delicious meal. With so many styles widely available, there’s a perfect pint for any cuisine of your choosing. That's a beer at 130 different venues categorized as a Restaurant. Try 5 more for Level 27!
Traveling the world is hard, but not for you. It's as easy as cracking open a new brew! You have had a beer from at least 110 different regions around the world. Try 5 more for Level 23!

beer.beer_name: Tmavý Speciál  2021 s meduňkou a citronovou kůrou

items.badge_description: Want to enjoy a day of brews, but need to keep your wits sharp? There are plenty of delicious brews under 5% for you to sip on throughout the day. That's 60 different beers with an ABV of 5% and lower. Try 5 more for Level 13!
99 bottles of beer on the wall, 99 bottles of beer. Take one down, pass it around.... That's 35 checkins with the serving style of Bottle. Try 5 more for Level 8!

There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 95 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 20!
Light and crisp, a Pilsner is all you need to make your day great. Though, perhaps another one would make it even better. That’s 35 different Pilsners. Try 5 more for Level 8!

beer.beer_description: Složení: pitná voda, ječné slady, chléb pšenično-žitný, upravené chmely
Výroční speciál k narození Bedřicha Smetany. Podíl pšeničného a ječného sladu jedna ku třem. Chmeleno: Staré Osvaldovy klony (daroval Žatecký chmelařský institut) a Harmonie.

beer.beer_name: Tmavý Speciál  2021 s meduňkou a citronovou kůrou
